text.section: In this subtitle the following words have the meanings indicated.

"Home medical equipment services" means the delivery, installation, maintenance, or replacement of, or instruction in the use of, medical equipment used by a sick or disabled individual to allow the individual to be maintained in a noninstitutional environment.

section.section: "Residential service agency" means any person that is engaged in a nongovernmental business of employing or contracting with individuals to provide home health care for compensation to an unrelated sick or disabled individual in the residence of that individual.
"Residential service agency" includes any agency that employs or contracts with individuals directly for hire as home health care providers.
